meanings.definition: The formation of blood cells in the body.
meanings.sent1: Hemopoieses is essential for our body to make blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study hemopoieses to understand how blood cells are created.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was hemopoieses, with guests dressing up as different blood cells.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like hemopoieses, giving life to her artistic endeavors.
meanings.sent5: In the factory of the body, hemopoieses works tirelessly to produce blood cells.

meanings.definition: The process of producing blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Understanding hemopoieses helps in knowing how our body makes blood cells.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the importance of hemopoieses in maintaining good health.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a hat producing blood cells through hemopoieses.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was like the precision of hemopoieses in creating blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as students learned about the wonders of hemopoieses.
